verses.name: Daniel 11:19
verses.text: Then he shall turn his face toward the fort of his own land: but he shall stumble and fall, and not be found.

verses.name: Daniel 11:20
verses.text: Then shall stand up in his estate a raiser of taxes in the glory of the kingdom: but within few days he shall be destroyed, neither in anger, nor in battle.

verses.name: Daniel 11:21
verses.text: And in his estate shall stand up a vile person, to whom they shall not give the honour of the kingdom: but he shall come in peaceably, and obtain the kingdom by flatteries.
